titles.title: Are Online Offers in Easy-to-Read Language Attractive?

descriptions.description: ICCHP-AAATE 2022 Open Access Compendium "Assistive Technology, Accessibility and (e)Inclusion" Part I / Petz, Andrea ; Hoogerwerf, Evert-Jan ; Mavrou, Katerina, Seite 72-77

This article uses tracking data to show the extent to which online services in easy-to-read language are used. It also focuses on the user behaviour of online services by people with intellectual disabilities. Finally, alternatives to easy-to-read language as online services for people with intellectual disabilities and their feasibility are described.
